@graph.description: This questionnaire was prepared for school pupils who are joining the AuBe project.

This interactive informational worksheet is for use when visiting Lake Stechlin, an IGB research location where citizens can participate in research for the AuBe project. The AuBe project is a citizen science project that investigates the effect of street light design on the impact of light pollution on insect populations.
Worksheets for the identification of insects native to Germany provided as part of the AuBe project.
Document of the listing of AuBe on Actionbound
These slides provide an introduction to the AuBe project, as presented at the Bertha-von-Suttner Gymnasium.
These presentation slides (in German language) provide an introduction to insect identification and entomology.
